nodes.text: Sonie was the supposed aunt of Cerasi, a female Melida from the planet Melida/Daan. In order to create a diversion for Jedi Knights Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi, Cerasi told two guards that she was looking for her father Wehutti in order to tell him that Sonie had been killed by the Daan in a proton grenade attack.
